Package com.myronmarston.music.transformers

Interface Summary
Transformer Implementations of this interface are used to take a NoteList and transform it into a new NoteList, using some kind of musical operation.
 

Class Summary
InversionTransformer Transformer that applies inversion to the given note list.
OctaveTransformer Transforms the given NoteList by moving it up or down some number of octaves.
RetrogradeTransformer Transformer that applies retrograde to the given NoteList.
RhythmicDurationTransformer Transformer that scales the the rhythmic duration of the notes by some scale factor.
SelfSimilarityTransformer Transformer that applies the self-similarity algorithm to the given NoteList.
TransposeTransformer Transformer that transposes the notes of the NoteList to a different pitch level.
VolumeTransformer Transformer that adjusts the volume of each note based on some scale factor.
